If you tried to update to a revision higher then 3368 and encounter the following SVN error in this folder:

External failed:.\Package\res_apk\InAppBilling\amazon\res 
Error: The node Error: '.\Package\res_apk\InAppBilling\amazon\res\res_apk\InAppBilling\amazon\res\values\gmp_strings.xml' 
Error: is not installable 

please delete the res folder and update again.
